SGCCRfC Wiki

Volcanology

Volcanology investigates magma processes, eruptive behavior, and volcanic hazards.

ðŸ”¥ Major Topics

  • Magma transport
  • Eruption forecasting
  • Ash cloud modeling
  • Volcanic gas monitoring
  • Thermal anomalies
  • Volcano seismology
  • Lahar & pyroclastic flow modeling
